thread.title: Shocking CCTV footage shows pilot suspected of being drunk stumbling through airport security

title: Shocking CCTV footage shows pilot suspected of being drunk stumbling through airport security
text: Shocking CCTV footage shows pilot suspected of being drunk stumbling through airport security Independent.ie An Indonesian pilot has reportedly been fired after he turned up for work suspected of being drunk. http://www.independent.ie/world-news/asia-pacific/shocking-cctv-footage-shows-pilot-suspected-of-being-drunk-stumbling-through-airport-security-35332457.html http://www.independent.ie/videos/article35332443.ece/08bac/AUTOCROP/h342/2740596-1483191993387996.jpg An Indonesian pilot has reportedly been fired after he turned up for work suspected of being drunk.
